## isCaseMock() function

Determines if a given value is a valid mock descriptor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isCaseMock: (maybeMock: unknown) => maybeMock is AnyMockDescriptor
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

maybeMock


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

The value to be checked.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

maybeMock is [AnyMockDescriptor](./case-plugin-base.anymockdescriptor.md)

A boolean indicating whether the provided value is a valid mock descriptor.

## Remarks

This function checks if the provided value is an object and contains the property '\_case:mock:type', indicating that it is a valid mock descriptor.
